snippet: The heir to the Tetra Pak carton fortune, Hans Kristian Rausing, was charged Monday with delaying the burial of his wife, Eva Rausing, London’s Metropolitan Police said.
abstract: Hans Kristian Rausing, the heir to the Tetra Pak carton fortune, is charged by British police with delaying the burial of his wife, Eva Rausing, who was found dead in the couple’s London town house.
lead_paragraph: The heir to the Tetra Pak carton fortune, Hans Kristian Rausing, was charged Monday with delaying the burial of his wife, Eva Rausing, London’s Metropolitan Police said.

headline.main: Britain: Packaging Heir Is Charged With Delaying Wife’s Burial
headline.print_headline: Britain: Packaging Heir Is Charged With Delaying Wife’s Burial
